channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brigitte Bardot, sex symbol then animal activist, dies at 91
item.description: Her death was announced Sunday in a statement by her foundation, saying Bardot had chosen to abandon “her prestigious movie career to dedicate her lif...

item.title: A ‘Wolf Moon’ Rises With The ‘Seven Sisters:’ The New Year’s Night Sky
item.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead (which also apply to mid-northern latitudes in the Northern Hemisphere...

item.title: 10 AI Agent Platforms Every Business Leader Needs To Know
item.description: AI agents are moving rapidly from experimentation to everyday business use, but choosing the right platform can feel overwhelming.

item.title: How State Wildlife Calendars Spotlight Nature, Provide Revenue Stream
item.description: Each new year helps many state agencies earn revenue to conserve nature by selling wildlife calendars that also showcase their incredible creatures.

item.title: Silver pulls back after topping $80 in historic year-end rally
item.description: Silver rose for a sixth session, building on a 10% gain on Friday that was its biggest one-day jump since 2008.

item.title: Robinhood’s CFO transition played out over 7 years and included a powerful mentorship story
item.description: The CFO handoff from Jason Warnick to Shiv Verma shows how Robinhood has evolved from meme-stock disruptor to a serious S&P 500 corporation.

item.title: Samus Aran Chogokin Now Available To Pre-Order For Its August Release
item.description: Following the release of 'Metroid Prime 4' and the news we were getting a chogokin of Samus Aran, the figure is now available to pre-order.

item.title: Why AI Hive Minds Will Be Needed To Attain AGI
item.description: How will we attain artificial general intelligence (AGI)? One theory is that we will need to use AGI to train other AGI. This is a hive mind or AGI ec...

item.title: No one’s happier about calls for a ‘backseat Fed’ than Fed insiders who were targeted by the White House this year
item.description: "How much can truly change under a single administration?" I asked one source. "Three years is a long time yet," came the response.

item.title: Stocks on track for third straight year of stellar returns. How about a fourth?
IRS reveals updated retirement contribution limits for 2026
item.description: New retirement plan contribution limits announced by the IRS for 2026 include higher 401(k), IRA and catch-up contribution amounts for enhanced retire...

item.title: Interoceanic Train derails in southern Mexico, injuring at least 15 and halting traffic on line
item.description: The Interoceanic Train linking the states of Oaxaca and Veracruz derailed as it passed a curve near the town of Nizanda.

item.title: U.S. stock futures flat as investors still hope to start 2026 on a roll
What are the hottest tech stocks for 2026? Here’s what ChatGPT and Gemini said
A humanoid-robot revolution is coming, but here's why it will take a while
Logan Paul bought a Pokémon card for $5.3M. Should you invest in collectibles?
$400k shipment of live lobsters hijacked en route to Midwest Costco locations
item.description: The FBI is investigating the theft of a $400,000 lobster delivery bound for Costco locations in Illinois and Minnesota that was allegedly hijacked.

item.title: Jack in the Box shut down more than 70 stores with more expected by year's end over financial struggles
item.description: Jack in the Box is closing dozens of restaurants as part of a major cost-cutting plan, with 72 locations shuttered so far and more expected in the nea...

item.title: Mortgage rates fall ahead of Christmas holiday
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year fixed mortgage fell this week to 6.18%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Wednesday. That is down fro...

item.title: Holiday barks sold at Aldi recalled over potential undeclared pecans, wheat: FDA
item.description: Silvestri Sweets recalled Choceur-branded holiday bark sold at Aldi stores after a packaging mix-up led to undeclared allergens in the popular treats.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
